text.p: These are the leading stories in the Angolan press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- South African President Thabo Mbeki met with Angolan President Jose Eduardo dos Santos on Wednesday. The two spoke about the crisis in Zaire.
- The Commander of the Angolan Police arrives in Cabinda on Thursday for a visit with police units in the province.
- The President's cabinet has denied reports by the South African Broadcast System that Angolan troops are involved in the fighting in Zaire.
- Ghanian President Jerry Rawlings was met at the airport by the President of the National Assembly, Roberto de Almedia. Rawlings was on a stopover on his way back from Botswana.
